name: Basic Template
description: Basic service template with minimum required intents already set (help, stop, navigate home).

properties.comment: First time user greeting + novice prompt

properties.text: Welcome to ${APP_NAME}. Think of a random number and I'll multiply it by ${MULTIPLY_BY}. So, what's the number?
Welcome back!
Give me a number. Any number.
You can tell me a random number, or if you need more instructions say 'help'.
Great! I know this.
Right. I got this one.
Okay. Just a sec.
Excellent! Here's the result:
${result.number} times ${MULTIPLY_BY} is ${multiply_result}.
You can ask me to repeat, or say 'stop' to exit the app.
I'm ready for another one.
You can give me another number.
To exit the app say 'stop'. Otherwise, think of a number, and I'll multiply it by ${MULTIPLY_BY}.
Well, what's the number you want multiplied?
Sorry, what's the number you want multiplied?
Tell me a number you want multiplied. If you need more instructions, say 'help'.

properties.comment: Change this help message to fit your service

properties.text: I'm a basic service template. You can change me to fit your needs. Right now, you can ask me to repeat, start over or stop.
What do you want to do: repeat, start over or stop?

properties.comment: Goes back to welcome / main menu
Here if a block fallback is empty

properties.text: Sorry, I don’t know that word. Please try again.

properties.comment: Handles error caught during the service run.

properties.text: I'm sorry, but something went wrong.
Please try again later.
Bye.
Until next time.
Don't be a stranger.
